body.p: Kentucky clerk and soldier. Commissioned as a notary public in Kentucky in 1863. Served as mustering officer, with the rank of first lieutenant, in the Office of the Adjutant General of Kentucky in 1864 and 1865. Served as a clerk and acting assistant adjutant general in 1865.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-007-0040; KYR-0002-161-0005; Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), VII; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 99.
